#summary Getting Stackless Python to play nice with Boost bindings

= Stackless Python with Boost Bindings =
== Setting Up ==
=== Boost C++ Libraries ===
Download the latest version from: http://www.boost.org/

=== Stackless Python ===
Download the latest appropriate version from: http://www.stackless.com/

== Building Under MSVC ==
Pull the Boost Python sources into your build (e.g. boost_1_38_0/libs/python/src)

Include the Python include directory (e.g. Python25\include)

Include the Stackless include directory (e.g. Python25\include\Stackless)

Add: "#define BOOST_PYTHON_STATIC_LIB" to boost\python\detail\config.hpp at line 62

define BOOST_ALL_NO_LIB under boost\config\user.hpp: #define BOOST_ALL_NO_LIB
